attributes.action: We would like to have road markings in the UK in Non-slip Paint
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a motorbike rider, I am awear of the dangers we face when the road is damp in the UK.

Every road marking becomes a death trap.

Trying to avoid any sort of turning, braking, accelerating or gear changes on any form of road marking is dangerous.

Hatched boxes, white arrows, white lines, palce names - these are all danergous. 

We would like to see these painted over time in non-slip paint.

How many lives would be saved?
